Source.Name: haskell-reflection
Source.Summary: This package addresses the configuration problem which is propagating configurations that are available at run-time
Source.Description: This package addresses the configuration problem which is propagating configurations that are available at run-time, allowing multiple configurations to coexist without resorting to mutable global variables or System.IO.Unsafe.unsafePerformIO.
